flawed_nl_solution:
There were 1150-150=<<1150-150=1010>>1010 people who didn't vote for John
That means James got 1010*0.7=<<1010*0.7=707>>707 votes
So the other candidate got 1010-707=<<1010-707=303>>303 votes
This means he got 303-150=<<303-150=153>>153 more votes than John.
#### 153

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1000, not 1010. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
